description: Calculates hypergeometric distribution properties for authentication preferences of users.

parameters.name: time_shift
parameters.description: Shifts time for given seconds in forward direction. Negative values warp time backwards.

committed.description: Number of platform users using insecure authentication scheme.
Number of platform users using pre-OTC over SMS authentication scheme.

available.description: Number of platform users available to use pre-OTC over SMS authentication scheme.

committed.description: Number of platform users using pre-OTC over email authentication scheme.

available.description: Number of platform users available to use pre-OTC over email authentication scheme.

committed.description: Number of platform users using pre-OTC over guard authentication scheme.

available.description: Number of platform users available to use pre-OTC over guard authentication scheme.

probability_mass_function.description: Probability mass function plot of hypergeometric distribution.

cumulative_distribution_function.description: Cumulative distribution function plot of hypergeometric distribution.

mean.description: Expected value of the hypergeometric distribution.

excess_kurtosis.description: Kurtosis minus 3 to determine mesokurticness, leptokurticness and platykurticness.

moment_generating_function.description: Real-valued random variable application as an alternative specification on probability distribution.

characteristic_function.description: Statistical characteristic function of the hypergeometric distribution.

200.description: Response containing detailed statistics for the requested analytics.
